title: Set up a jenkins slave node with quantal at host level

content.html:
Not really belonging to release-tools repo but related.

As we need to install inside pbuilder the same DRI support packages to get proper DRI support in tests, we will need to install a jenkins slave with quantal, so all our quantal builds expected to run DRI tests are able to run them properly.

@gerkey: what do you think to get or convert one in quantal with GPU access?
